Cufy

Your Safety is Our Priority

We've built Cufy with comprehensive safety features to ensure you can focus on making genuine connections in a secure and trusted environment.

Built-in Safety Features

Multiple layers of protection to keep you safe while you connect with fellow students.

College Email Verification

Every user must verify their identity with a valid college email address to ensure authentic student connections.

Secure Messaging

All conversations are encrypted end-to-end to protect your privacy and personal information.

Photo Verification

Profile photos are manually reviewed to prevent fake accounts and ensure genuine user profiles.

Report & Block System

Easily report inappropriate behavior or block users who make you uncomfortable.

Privacy Controls

Complete control over who can see your profile and personal information.

24/7 Support

Our dedicated safety team is available around the clock to address any concerns.

Dating Safety Tips

Essential guidelines to help you stay safe while meeting new people and building relationships.

üè´

Meet in Public Places

Always choose public locations like campus cafeterias, libraries, or coffee shops for your first meetings.

üë•

Tell a Friend

Let a friend or roommate know where you&apos;re going and who you&apos;re meeting before any date.

üß†

Trust Your Instincts

If something feels off, trust your gut feeling and don&apos;t hesitate to leave or end the conversation.

üìπ

Video Chat First

Consider having a video call before meeting in person to verify identity and build comfort.

üîí

Keep Personal Info Private

Don&apos;t share your home address, phone number, or financial information until you build trust.

üö®

Report Suspicious Behavior

If someone asks for money, seems fake, or makes you uncomfortable, report them immediately.

Community Guidelines

Our community standards help create a respectful and safe environment for everyone.

Be respectful and kind to all members of the community
Use recent, authentic photos that clearly show your face
Be honest about your age, college, and intentions
Respect others&apos; boundaries and consent
No harassment, bullying, or inappropriate content
No solicitation, spam, or commercial activities
Report any violations of community guidelines
Maintain appropriate conversation topics

Need Help? We're Here for You

If you experience any safety concerns, harassment, or inappropriate behavior, please contact our safety team immediately.
